title: How to fix Google assistant problem
content: My Google assistant won't respond when phone is locked. It doesn't respond to voice or a squeeze. But once you unlock it it will respond to a squeeze still doesn't respond to voice though. I checked all the basics. Updated the app, made sure settings are on, retrained the voice, nothing fixes it. Anyone know if its a Google issue or just my phone ?
category: Google Assistant and Voice Actions, Google Pixel 3
